description: A serene afternoon in a lush, meticulously manicured garden. A winding path meanders through the scene, lined with mature trees and adorned with ornate lamp posts. A grand fountain serves as a central focal point, surrounded by delicate stone carvings and soft, ruffled water features. In the distance, majestic buildings rise from the surrounding cityscape, their rooftops a subtle reminder of the urban world beyond the garden's tranquil borders.
